login.sessionExpiredTitle: Session expired. Please log in again.

instanceNotFound.message: Check the access link and try again
instanceNotFound.joinTitle: Do you want to manage your hotel with Roomdoo?

resetPassword.title: Reset password
resetPassword.passwordLetterRequired: Password must contain at least one letter
resetPassword.passwordNumberRequired: Password must contain at least one number
resetPassword.passwordChanged: The password has been changed successfully
resetPassword.invalidToken: The link has expired or is invalid

requestResetPassword.title: Enter your email and we will send you a link to reset your password
requestResetPassword.requestSent: An email has been sent to reset your password

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.noResultsFoundMessage: There are no {entities} matching your search or applied filters. Try adjusting the criteria.
contacts.noContactsMessage: You have not registered any contacts yet. Click the button below to add your first contact.
contacts.noCustomersMessage: You have not registered any customers yet. Click the button below to add your first customer.
contacts.noGuestsMessage: Contacts will automatically become guests when they stay at your property.
contacts.noAgenciesMessage: You have not registered any agencies yet. Click the button below to add your first agency.
contacts.noSuppliersMessage: Contacts will automatically become suppliers when a supplier invoice is issued in their name.

reports.title: Generate reports
reports.subtitle: Choose the report you want to generate and configure the necessary parameters
reports.cleaningReportDescription: Generates the room cleaning plan for the selected day. It classifies reservations as Client (ongoing stays), Departure (check-outs of the day), and Review (rooms that have been vacant for at least one day and have an expected check-in on the selected date).
reports.checkinReportDescription: Shows the list of all expected check-ins for the selected date.
reports.checkoutReportDescription: Shows the list of all expected check-outs for the selected date.
reports.servicesReportDescription: Generates a list of services booked within the selected date range, including date, quantity, and associated reservation details.
reports.paymentsReportDescription: This report will include all payments recorded in the selected period, including payment methods and amounts.
reports.ineReportDescription: Generates the XML file corresponding to the selected date range, ready to be sent to the INE platform.

userSettings.yourLogin: This is the name or email you use to access your account
userSettings.yourPassword: This is the password you use to access your account
userSettings.passwordChanged: The password has been changed successfully
userSettings.passwordsDoNotMatch: The new passwords do not match
userSettings.userUpdated: User data has been updated successfully
